Plot:
he Memory is a warm love story between Film, a superstar who lost his memory by an accident and Ja, a paparazzi girl who follows and snaps every shots of Film for money. They meet each other by fate somewhere in the North where surrounded by romantic scenery. The two who used to be enemy finally fall in love before Film gets his memory back, but couldn't recognize the girl he met in the North. All of his memory about her is really fade, only the warm touch of the girl he can recall. He believes she's waiting for him somewhere far far away.
